name: Ninja Must Die
storyline:
Three hundred years ago, the demon tribe from the demon realm opened the door of Rashen and invaded the world.  
During this epic disaster, two heroes stood up, led the people to repel the demon clan, and sealed the demon king. 
In order to rebuild people's homes and bring long-term peace, the heroes together established the country of Wano. And their descendants, the samurai representing the glory and the ninja symbolizing the dark side of the moon, together guard this country. 
 
Three hundred years later, the samurai as the ruling class has long been decayed, and they fear the power of the ninja. Suspicion and hatred brought the long-lasting Wano country to the brink of war, and the demon clan, who had been sealed for a hundred years, also quietly revealed his minions... 
As a fledgling new ninja, you will witness the entanglement of ninjas and samurai for hundreds of years, face the mysterious demons who are watching the world in the dark, start an endless spiral of fate with the genius who raises the flag of rebellion, and uncover all the suspense and conspiracy.
summary: "Ninja Must Die" combines horizontal parkour game horizontal action game. It has carried out a subversive innovation and defined a new game type of "action combat parkour RPG".Beautiful ink painting style, hearty battle duel, brings players a unique cool experience on mobile devices.
